author: Adrian Collins
description:
Ciri awakes to the water from a bucket full of her friend’s heads sloshing over her. In The Rats: A Witcher Tale, the dastardly crew of thieves from The Witcher S4 are back in this spinoff heist tale featuring Dolph Lundgren as a washed up witcher.  The wider war with the Nilfgaardians is resulting in […]

The post REVIEW: The Rats: a Witcher Tale appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: The Rats: a Witcher Tale
